title: 83: Dating Nightmares with Craig Conant
itunes:title: 83: Dating Nightmares with Craig Conant
description:
The Broads are joined by their favorite comedian and comrade, Craig Conant, to discuss some dating nightmares! They chat experiencing the nightmare date, BEING the nightmare date, hot dates gone wrong, they somehow get into Craig’s late in life circumcision, and read some of the #broadsquad’s nightmare tales! 
Follow Craig at @craigpconant and listen to his podcast: Community Service with Craig Conant 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/community-service-with-craig-conant/id1441475405
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
***SKILLSHARE: Get two months of Skillshare for free by going to http://skillshare.com/chatty
*** FRAMEBRIDGE: Get 15% off your first order by going to framebridge.com (http://framebridge.com/) and using promo code CHATTY
*** FAB FIT FUN: Use coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at ​www.fabfitfun.com (http://www.fabfitfun.com/) ​ #fabfitfunpartner
*** CANDID: Go to http://candidco.com/chatty and use code CHATTY to get seventy-five dollars off!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
